criticalSuccess.message: Choose two of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Regongar has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Regongar’s personal biases, one of Regongar’s resistances, or one of Regongar’s weaknesses. you can choose the same option twice to learn two pieces of information from the same category.

success.message: Choose one of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Regongar has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Regongar’s personal biases, one of Regongar’s resistances, or one of Regongar’s weaknesses.

criticalFailure.message: Choose a piece of information to learn about, as success, but the information is incorrect. For instance, you might think Regongar is susceptible to flattery when actually Regongar is resistant to flattery.
